name: Sol: Last Light
description:
Experience the action-packed gameplay of SOL: Last Light. A third-person action-adventure set in a post-apocalyptic world. Learn to control your newly discovered power to harness the energy of the sun and battle against robots as you climb higher up the mountain to find your captured sister.

Play through 5 unique levels as you unlock key abilities to defeat enemies. Uncover the secrets of this shattered world and find clues that will lead you toward saving your sister.

“The world is scarred from the sins of the past. The Sun has dimmed darker than ever recorded, lowering the atmosphere of Earth to apocalyptic conditions. Humans now roam the Wastes of what was the North American continent as groups of nomads, scavenging the landscape for any means of survival.” - John Black IV
